Posts.Content: D, Sorry to hear of your diagnosis and for the need for a forum like this. I do not have an answer for you as I had a different cancer but I would have to say it is good that you are just heaving problems now in that area at your age. Some of us start to have issues well before that age. I am going to move your post into the prostate forum as that is where you'll get the most views and answers. My first worry would be getting rid of the cancer and dealing with any issues afterwards. Good luck, Allen

Posts.Title: Newly diagnosed prostate cancer

Posts.Content: No problem sir. I guess most on here are on the west coast not awake yet but be sure you will get a lot of help here. I remember the brick that hit me in the face the day I was told I had cancer and this place helped get me through the treatments. Things have advanced so much these days and everything is extremely manageable. Keep coming back and your questions will be answered and your fears put to rest. I'll use my usual signature again. Good luck, Allen
